fields.name: StackMetaLearnerKWargs
fields.description: Optional parameters to pass to the initializer of the meta-learner.

fields.name: StackMetaLearnerTrainPercentage
fields.description: Specifies the proportion of the training set (when choosing train and validation type of training) to be reserved for training the meta-learner. Default value is 0.2.

fields.name: StackMetaLearnerType
fields.description: The meta-learner is a model trained on the output of the individual heterogeneous models.
